mapper.insert: insert into qna_board values (get_seq('qnaboardSeq'), #{mem_no}, #{qna_password}, #{qna_secret_chk}, #{qna_title}, #{qna_content}, sysdate(), 0, qna_board_no, 0, 0, 0, 0 )
mapper.update: update qna_board set qna_group_order=qna_group_order+1 where qna_group_no=#{qna_group_no} and qna_group_order>#{qna_group_order}
update qna_board set qna_status=#{qna_status} where qna_group_no=#{qna_group_no} and qna_group_depth=#{qna_group_depth}
mapper.select: select count(*) from qna_board where qna_group_no=#{qna_board_no}
mapper.update: update qna_board set qna_show=1, qna_title='', qna_content='' where qna_board_no=#{qna_board_no}

choose.when: where qna_title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or qna_content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')

mapper.select: select IFnull(count(*),0) from qna_board qq inner join member_Info mm on qq.mem_no=mm.mem_no

select qq.*,mm.mem_no,mm.Nickname from qna_board qq inner join member_Info mm on qq.mem_no=mm.mem_no
order by qq.qna_group_no desc, qq.qna_group_order asc limit #{startRow},10
mapper.update: update qna_board set qna_hit=qna_hit+1 where qna_board_no=#{qna_board_no}
mapper.select: select qq.*,mm.mem_no,mm.Nickname from qna_board qq inner join member_Info mm on qq.mem_no=mm.mem_no where mm.mem_no=#{mem_no} and qq.qna_show=0 order by qq.qna_regdate desc

select qq.*,mm.mem_no,mm.Nickname from qna_board qq inner join member_Info mm on qq.mem_no=mm.mem_no
order by qq.qna_group_no desc, qq.qna_group_order asc limit #{qq_startRow},10
